Question 142) A resident of a metropolitan region is 50% likely to be delayed to work when it rains in the region; If it does not rain, its probability of delay is 25%. For a certain day, the meteorology service estimates at 30% the likelihood of rainfall in this region.
What is the likelihood that this resident is late for the service on the day to which the estimate of rain was given?
A) 0.075
B) 0.150
C) 0.325
D) 0.600
E) 0.800
